meanings.definition: A person who has a broad general knowledge in many different areas.
meanings.sent1: As a generalist, she knew a little about everything.
meanings.sent2: The generalist at the trivia night answered questions from various categories.
meanings.sent3: The generalist tried to fix the computer, but ended up making it worse.
meanings.sent4: Being a generalist is like having a toolbox with a bit of every tool.
meanings.sent5: The generalist's mind was a treasure trove of random facts.

meanings.definition: A physician whose practice is not limited to one specialty.
meanings.sent1: The generalist doctor can treat a wide range of medical conditions.
meanings.sent2: She decided to see a generalist for her annual check-up.
meanings.sent3: The generalist doctor joked that he could cure a broken heart too.
meanings.sent4: In a world of specialists, the generalist doctor was a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The generalist physician was like a medical jack-of-all-trades.

meanings.definition: A plant or animal that can thrive in a wide range of environmental conditions.
meanings.sent1: The generalist plant could grow in almost any soil type.
meanings.sent2: The generalist bird species adapted easily to different climates.
meanings.sent3: The generalist animal happily hopped from forest to desert without a care.
meanings.sent4: The generalist species was a survivor in the ever-changing environment.
meanings.sent5: The generalist plant was like a chameleon, blending into any habitat.
